meka.experiment

Interface Experiment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LogSupporter, weka.core.OptionHandler, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExperiment

    public interface Experiment
extends weka.core.OptionHandler, Serializable, LogSupporter
    Interface for experiments.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
